duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the development strategies for targeting clients and building strategic alliances with non-profits, regional organizations, and technology accelerators.
Develop, maintain, and expand relationships with stakeholders ranging from Facilitate Managers to City Managers and Board/Council Members.
Lead customer meetings, contract negotiations, and present at public Board or Council meetings.
Maintain a revenue and margin quota and robust sales funnel.
Mentor, partner, and train new Business Development Managers.
Schedule appointments and meetings with customers to review program opportunities and qualify the opportunity.
Attend critical networking and trade show events to obtain leads and present a positive public image of the company.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree or four year degree from an accredited college or university required
